title: Replace transcription textarea placeholder with accessible French copy

requirements.summary: Replace the transcription textarea placeholder with the exact French string "Votre transcription apparaîtra ici…" while keeping the textarea read-only.
acceptanceCriteria: In the transcription textarea (frontend/src/App.tsx), the placeholder is no longer "Your transcription will appear here...".
The placeholder displays exactly: "Votre transcription apparaîtra ici…" (including the ellipsis character).
The textarea remains read-only and continues to clearly indicate that transcription text will appear in that area.

file_operations.description: Update the transcription <textarea> placeholder value to the exact French string "Votre transcription apparaîtra ici…" (with the ellipsis character) while leaving the textarea readOnly behavior unchanged.
